artist: Artist: Josh Simmons; Publisher: Top Shelf Productions, Marietta, Ga.
creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Saddle stitched binding, full bleed, photomechanical image of sun with text printed in color offset lithography on wove paper covers; 32 pp.
inscription: Title page, black ink pen: FLY - - / YOU ARE THE / BEST PERSON IN / THE WHOLE / WORLD! / (heart) JOSH / SIMMONS / 2003
medium: Color and black-and-white offset lithography; bound volume
title: Happy, no. 1
